mapper.select:
select g.gongGaoMingCheng,g.faBuShiJian,g.lanMu,g.neiRong,g.liuLanShu,r.xingMing,g.id as id1 from gonggao as g join renyuandangan as r on (g.buMenId = #{buMenId} or g.buMenId = 0 or g.dangAnId = #{dangAnId}) and g.dangAnId = r.id and g.zhuangTai = 1
and (g.gongGaoMingCheng like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%') or g.neiRong like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%') or r.xingMing like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%'))

select g.gongGaoMingCheng, g.faBuShiJian, g.lanMu, g.neiRong, g.liuLanShu, ry.xingMing, g.id, bm.buMenMingCheng, g.dangAnId, g.fuJianDiZhi from gonggao as g join bumen as bm join renyuandangan as ry on g.buMenId = bm.id and g.dangAnId = ry.id and g.id = #{id}

select g.gongGaoMingCheng,g.faBuShiJian,g.lanMu,g.neiRong,g.liuLanShu,r.xingMing,g.id as id1 from gonggao as g join renyuandangan as r where g.dangAnId = #{dangAnId} and g.zhuangTai = #{zhuangTai}
and (g.gongGaoMingCheng like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%') or g.neiRong like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%') or r.xingMing like concat(concat('%',#{souSuo}),'%'))
